actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that the U.S. Government should seek agreement with other members of the United Nations on prohibition of weather modification activity as a weapon of war.

summary.text: Declares the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should seek an agreement with other members of the United Nations to prohibit research, experimentation, or use of weather modification as a weapon.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that the U.S. Government should seek agreement with other members of the United Nations on prohibition of weather modification activity as a weapon of war.
